about: A Dublin Core metadata schema for datasets aligned with DCAT AP 2.1

dataset_fields.label: Title
dataset_fields.help_text: A descriptive title for the dataset.

dataset_fields.label: Description
dataset_fields.help_text: A free-text account of the dataset.

dataset_fields.label: Keywords
dataset_fields.help_text: Keywords or tags describing the dataset. Use commas to separate multiple values.

dataset_fields.label: Organization
dataset_fields.help_text: The CKAN organization the dataset belongs to.

dataset_fields.label: Temporal coverage
dataset_fields.help_text: The temporal period or periods the dataset covers.

dataset_fields.label: Spatial coverage
dataset_fields.help_text: A geographic region that is covered by the dataset.

dataset_fields.label: Theme
dataset_fields.help_text: A category of the dataset. A Dataset may be associated with multiple themes.

dataset_fields.label: Publisher
dataset_fields.help_text: Entity responsible for making the dataset available.

dataset_fields.label: License
dataset_fields.help_text: Information about rights held in and over the resource.

dataset_fields.label: Contact points
dataset_fields.help_text: Contact information for enquiries about the dataset.

dataset_fields.label: Language
dataset_fields.help_text: One or more languages of the dataset.

dataset_fields.label: Digital Object Identier
dataset_fields.help_text: Digital Object Identifier for the dataset

dataset_fields.label: Creator
dataset_fields.form_placeholder: The entity primarily responsible for making the dataset
dataset_fields.help_text: An entity primarily responsible for making the dataset.

dataset_fields.label: Contributor
dataset_fields.form_placeholder: An entity responsible for making contributions to the dataset
dataset_fields.help_text: An entity responsible for making contributions to the dataset.

dataset_fields.label: Date
dataset_fields.help_text: A point or period of time associated with an event in the lifecycle of the dataset. Format: YYYY-MM-DD

dataset_fields.label: Type
dataset_fields.help_text: The nature or genre of the dataset.

dataset_fields.label: Source
dataset_fields.help_text: A related resource from which the described dataset is derived. The described resource may be derived from the related resource in whole or in part.

dataset_fields.label: Relation
dataset_fields.help_text: A related resource. Recommended best practice is to identify the related resource by means of a string conforming to a formal identification system.

dataset_fields.label: Data Standard
dataset_fields.help_text: The metadata standard or schema used for this dataset

dataset_fields.label: Provenance
dataset_fields.help_text: Detailed information about the origin and processing history of the dataset

dataset_fields.label: Quality Indicator
dataset_fields.help_text: Indicator of the dataset's quality or reliability based on a 5-star rating system.

dataset_fields.label: Quality Details
dataset_fields.help_text: Additional details about the quality assessment of this dataset.

dataset_fields.label: Preservation Statement
dataset_fields.help_text: Information about long-term preservation plans for this dataset

resource_fields.label: Name
resource_fields.form_placeholder: A descriptive title for the resource.
resource_fields.help_text: A name given to the resource.

resource_fields.label: Format
resource_fields.help_text: The file format, physical medium, or dimensions of the resource. Examples include size and duration. Recommended best practice is to use a controlled vocabulary such as the list of Internet Media Types [MIME].
